Mod0_Description: Rock shrapnel flies outward when {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is destroyed or expires, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c} to surrounding enemies. This damage is increased by {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} bonuses.
Mod2_Description: Casting {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
simple_desc: Defensive Skill: Rocks surround you, granting an explosive shield.
name: Earthen Bulwark
